synopsis.text: If you're a fan of 'Sora no Woto', you're in for a treat! The Blu-ray and DVD volumes 4 and 7 will feature two bonus episodes, releasing on June 23rd and September 22nd respectively. In the first extra episode, the girls find themselves in a pickle as Kanata grows suspicious of their clandestine calvados brewing operation. To divert her attention, they stage a mock battle with an intriguing wager. But as the alcohol flows, the situation spirals out of control! The second bonus episode takes a more introspective turn as Kanata, now a seasoned member of the clocktower fortress, ponders her dreams and aspirations. To gain some perspective, she initiates a heartfelt conversation with her comrades about their own future goals. Will Kanata discover her dream amidst their shared wisdom? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
